::Zardus/FZ::

Zardus nods. "We have stasis pods, but not any Maximal ones. We probably have enough Maximal spare parts to turn the pods into Maximal though, and to disguise Vamprah. I'll show you to them whenever you're done here."

While he speaks, his internal computer was busy replying to other bots. "Permission granted, Jaws," he replies to Jaws after recieving the IGL transmission as well, "Use the two weeks to train. The training rooms at the Iron Fist have full holographic capabilities and should be enough."

He also realizes that he hadn't replied to Composer, and sends a message to him as well. "Put all the equipment in Equipment Room 5. The nearest console should be able to tell you where that is."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ walks into the lab, looking around. "I'm here Lady Hawk. How are the prototypes?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack:::
> 
> Wheeljack: Hmm, thats a pretty good idea.  Zardus, do we have any stasis pods?
